title: ‘Yellow Card!’ Barbara Guarischi Cited Under UCI’s New Rules at Tour de France Femmes
content:
Cycling's version of 'yellow cards' are part of a wave of new safety rules being tested for the remainder of 2024 and riders with various infractions could be suspended.

Read the full article at ‘Yellow Card!’ Barbara Guarischi Cited Under UCI’s New Rules at Tour de France Femmes on Velo.
author: ahood
